var createDateSum=function createDateSum(ISOdate){var DateTimeString="";console.log(ISOdate,"ISOdate");if(ISOdate.includes("Z")){var splitedISOArrays=ISOdate.split(".");DateTimeString=splitedISOArrays[0];}else{DateTimeString=ISOdate;}var reducer=function reducer(accumulator,currentValue){return accumulator+currentValue;};var dateTimeArray=DateTimeString.split("T");var dateString=dateTimeArray[0];var dateArray=dateString.split("-");var dateSum=dateArray.reduce(reducer);var timeString=dateTimeArray[1];var timeArray=timeString.split(":");var timeSum=timeArray[0]+timeArray[1];// date and time return as strings
var dateTimeSumString=dateSum+timeSum;return Number(dateTimeSumString);};export default createDateSum;
